meanings.definition: A person or thing that disposes of something
meanings.sent1: The school janitor is one of the disposers of the trash every day.
meanings.sent2: The city's waste management team includes many disposers who help keep the streets clean.
meanings.sent3: The disposers at the recycling plant had a competition to see who could dispose of the most items in an hour.
meanings.sent4: In the game of chess, the pawns act as disposers, sacrificing themselves to protect the more important pieces.
meanings.sent5: The disposers in the kitchen worked efficiently to clear out all the leftover food.

meanings.definition: A device for disposing of waste, such as a garbage disposal unit
meanings.sent1: The new house came with a modern disposers installed in the sink.
meanings.sent2: Many households find disposers to be very convenient for getting rid of food scraps.
meanings.sent3: The disposers in the kitchen hummed happily as they ground up the leftover vegetables.
meanings.sent4: The disposers in the restaurant's sink worked tirelessly to grind down all the food waste.
meanings.sent5: The disposers in the sink roared to life as the chef cleaned up after dinner service.
